Description.Value: Performs a series of lightsaber attacks that deals <<1>> weapon damage over 3 seconds. Standard and weak enemies are additionally stunned for the duration of the effect. Strikes with both weapons if dual wielding. Cannot be interrupted.
Able to equip training sabers.
Slashes the target for <<1>> weapon damage. Attacks with both weapons if dual wielding.
Slashes up to 8 enemies within 5 meters in front of you for <<1>> weapon damage. Attacks with both weapons if dual wielding.
Raises a lightsaber ward, increasing melee and ranged defenses by 50% and absorbing 25% of the damage taken from Force and tech attacks. Lasts <<1[%d seconds/%d second/%d seconds]>>.
Generates 2 rage and inflicts <<1>> weapon damage with a series of quick melee attacks. Attacks with both weapons if dual wielding.
Increases the target's melee, ranged, Force and tech bonus damage and healing by 5% for 60 minutes. If the target is a group member, all other group members are also affected.
Able to equip single-bladed lightsabers.
Blasts the target with a Force-enhanced scream, dealing <<1>> kinetic damage. In addition, standard and weak enemies are stunned for 4 seconds.
Enters a balanced lightsaber form, increasing all damage dealt and reducing all damage received by 3%.
Chokes the target, stunning it for <<2>> seconds. Deals <<1>> kinetic damage and builds 3 rage over the duration. This ability can be channeled while moving.

Jumps to a distant target, dealing <<1>> damage with the main-hand weapon, immoblizing the target for <<2[%d seconds/%d second/%d seconds]>> and interrupting the target's current action. Builds 3 rage. Cannot be used against targets in cover.
Able to equip vibroswords and other one-handed melee weapons tied to the Strength attribute.
Increase movement speed by 35% while not in combat.
Paralyzes up to 8 nearby enemies in fear, preventing all action for up to <<1>> seconds. Damage ends the effect prematurely. Has no effect on droids.
Able to ride speeder bikes.
Able to equip medium-weight armor.
Throws the main-hand lightsaber at a target, dealing <<1>> weapon damage. Only usable on targets at or below 30% max health.
Purges incapacitating and movement-impairing effects.

Label.Value: Heroic Moment: Call on the Force

Description.Value: Calls upon the Force to aid you and your companion, immediately finishing the cooldown on Saber Ward and restoring 2% of your maximum health every 3 seconds. Requires an active companion. Lasts 1 minute.
Smashes up to 8 enemies within 5 meters, dealing <<1>> kinetic damage. Stuns weak and standard enemies for <<2[%d seconds/%d second/%d seconds]>>.
Smashes into the target, disrupting its current action and preventing that ability from being used for the next 4 seconds.
Channels your hatred to restore your health. Cannot be used during combat.
Each use of Assault, Battering Assault, and Crippling Slash reduces the active cooldown of Cloak of Pain by 3 seconds.
Force Charge, Force Gash, Devastating Blast, and Obliterate snare the target, reducing its movement speed by 50% for <<1>> seconds.
You generate 4 rage when stunned, immobilized, put to sleep, or knocked around.

You build 2 Fury when attacked. This effect cannot occur more than once every 1.5 seconds. Additionally, the effect of your lightsaber forms are improved while they are active: Shii-Cho Form: Further increases damage reduction by 2%. Juyo Form: Increases internal and elemental damage reduction by 5%. Ataru Form: Increases your movement speed by 15%.
Increases the duration of Undying Rage by 2 seconds.
Reduces the cooldown of Undying Rage by 30 seconds.
Reduces the cooldown of Obfuscate by 15 seconds and Disruption by 2 seconds.
Reduces the cooldown of Force Choke by 15 seconds.
Force Camouflage removes all cleansable effects when activated.
Reduces the cooldown of Intimidating Roar by 15 seconds. In addition, you build up to 30 Fury over the course of using Channel Hatred. This effect cannot occur more than once every 30 seconds.

Crippling Slash consumes 2 less rage. In addition, using Crippling Slash against a target already slowed by your Crippling Slash immobilizes that target for 3 seconds. This immobilizing effect cannot be applied to the same target more than once every 10 seconds.
Sweeping Slash deals 25% more damage.
Increases the duration of Force Camouflage by 2 seconds and further increases the movement speed bonus of Force Camouflage by 20%.
While Cloak of Pain is active, it generates 1 rage whenever you are attacked. This effect cannot occur more than once every 3 seconds.
Increases the range of Obfuscate by 6 meters and allows Cloak of Pain to be used while stunned.
Ravage immobilizes the target for the duration of the ability.
Reduces damage taken from area effects by 30%.
Increases the damage dealt by Cloak of Pain by 15% and increases its duration by 4 seconds.
Getting attacked while Saber Ward is active heals you for 3% of your maximum health. This effect cannot occur more than once every 1.5 seconds.
When Predation is applied or refreshed, it purges movement-impairing effects. Additionally, the movement speed bonus of Predation is increased by 30%.
Increases the duration of Force Charge's immobilize effect by 1 second.

Strikes the target with both lightsabers for <<1>> weapon damage. Each use of this ability grants Annihilator for <<2>> seconds, lowering the cooldown of your next Annihilate by 1.5 seconds. Stacks up to 3 times. Requires two lightsabers.
Force Charge builds 1 additional rage.

Your direct damage attacks that critically hit a bleeding target build 1 rage. This effect cannot occur more than once every 4 seconds. In addition, Annihilate makes its target assailable for <<1>> seconds. Assailable targets take 7% more elemental and internal damage.
Dealing bleed damage to a target increases your damage reduction by 5% for 3 seconds.

Charges your lightsabers with deadly energy for 15 seconds, causing your next 3 successful melee attacks to make the target bleed for <<1>> internal damage over 6 seconds. Stacks up to 3 times. Juyo Form must be active.
Stabs the target for <<1>> weapon damage and deals an additional <<2>> internal damage over <<3[%d seconds/%d second/%d seconds]>>. Requires two lightsabers.
Summons dark Force power to gash the target, causing it to bleed for <<1>> internal damage over <<2[%d seconds/%d second/%d seconds]>>.
Your bleed effects have a 20% chance to build 1 rage when dealing damage. This effect cannot occur more than once every 4 seconds.
Critical hits with bleed effects heal you for 1% of your maximum health.
Increases the direct damage dealt by Rupture by 5%.
Juyo Form can now stack up to 6 times, and Annihilate can now stack up to 4 times in total.
Your bleed effects are 1% more likely to critically hit per stack of Juyo Form.
Reduces the minimum range of Force Charge by 10 meters and its cooldown by 2 seconds.
Smash spreads your Rupture and Force Gash bleeds to targets it hits, if it hits a target already affected by those bleeds.
Increases the critical strike damage of your bleed effects by 5%.
Juyo Form and Annihilator build two stacks at a time.
Increases the duration of Rupture's bleed effect by 3 seconds.
Increases all damage dealt by 5% for <<1>> seconds after dealing damage with Smash or Raging Burst. This effect cannot occur more than once every 8 seconds.
While Shii-Cho Form is active, Furious Strike grants Furious Defense, increasing your defense chance by 10% for <<1>> seconds.
Reduces the cooldown of Obliterate by 3 seconds, and while Shii-Cho Form is active, Force Charge and Obliterate make your next Force Scream consume no rage.
Force Charge and Obliterate make your next Smash or Raging Burst used within <<1>> seconds an automatic critical hit.
Strikes the target for <<1>> weapon damage. Attacks with both weapons if dual wielding.

Progressively slows the target from 50% to 5% movement speed over <<1[%d seconds/%d second/%d seconds]>> and deals <<3>> kinetic damage each second. At the end of the duration, the target is crushed and takes an additional <<2>> kinetic damage.
Blasts the enemy target with a powerful burst of Force energy, dealing <<1>> kinetic damage.

While Shii-Cho Form is active, Assault, Battering Assault, Vicious Slash, Sweeping Slash, Force Scream, Vicious Throw, and Furious Strike reduce the active cooldowns of Smash, Raging Burst, and Obliterate by 1 second.
Jumps to a target, dealing <<1>> weapon damage and immobilizing it for <<2>> second. Can be used while immobilized. Strikes with both weapons if dual wielding.

While Shii-Cho Form is active, damage dealt by Force Crush grants Destruction, increasing the damage dealt by your next Smash or Raging Burst by 5% and reducing the rage consumed by your next Smash or Raging Burst by 34%. Destruction stacks up to 3 times. Additionally, Berserk instantly grants 3 stacks of Destruction when used while Shii-Cho Form is active.

Vicious Slash, Sweeping Slash, Vicious Throw, and Furious Strike deal <<1>> additional Force energy damage. In addition, damage dealt by Smash and Raging Burst overwhelms targets for <<2>> seconds. Overwhelmed targets take 10% more damage from area attacks.
Increases the critical strike chance of Vicious Slash, Sweeping Slash, Vicious Throw, and Furious Strike by 10%.
Obliterate and Force Crush each consume 1 less rage.
Increases the critical strike damage of all attacks by 15%.
Shii-Cho Form increases armor penetration by 30%.
Increases the damage dealt by Smash by 40% and reduces the cooldowns of Smash and Raging Burst by 3 seconds each.
Increases the damage you deal with saber attacks by 5%.
Activating an attack that spends rage and defeating opponents builds Fury. When 30 stacks of Fury are built, you become Furious, enabling the use of Berserk, Predation, and Bloodthirst.
Allows you to wield two one-handed weapons.

Throws both lightsabers in a straight line towards the target, dealing <<1>> weapon damage to up to 8 enemies directly in front of you up to 30 meters away. Affected enemies are slowed by 50% for <<2>> seconds. Requires two lightsabers.

Requires and converts 30 stacks of Fury to go Berserk. Lasts for 6 charges. This effect varies based on your current lightsaber form: Shii-Cho Form: Instantly generates 4 rage, plus 8 additional rage over the next few seconds. Juyo Form: Increases the critical chance of your bleed attacks by 100% and causes bleed damage to heal your group for 1% of max health each tick. Ataru Form: Grants 30% alacrity. Each attack consumes 1 charge.

Reduces all damage taken by 20% and deals <<1>> energy damage to attackers. This effect cannot occur more than once every 1.5 seconds. Lasts <<2[%d/%d/%d]>> seconds. Cloak of Pain refreshes to its full duration when attacked, but this effect cannot last more than <<3[%d/%d/%d]>> seconds in total.
Obscures the target's vision, reducing its melee and ranged accuracy by 90% for 6 seconds. Cannot be used on Operation bosses. This ability does not respect the global cooldown.

Vicious Slash, Sweeping Slash, Vicious Throw, Massacre, Annihilate, and Furious Strike refund 1 rage when used. In addition, Battering Assault beats down its target for <<1>> seconds. Beat Down targets take 5% more damage from melee attacks.
Enters an aggressive lightsaber form, causing your melee attacks to increase all damage dealt by 1% for <<1>> seconds. Stacks up to 5 times. This effect cannot occur more than once every second.

Shuts down the target droid, incapacitating it for <<1[%d/%d/%d]>> seconds. While disabled, the droid's systems reboot, causing non-standard and non-weak droids to heal rapidly. Damage causes this effect to end prematurely. Only one droid can be disabled at a time.

Obscures yourself with the Force, becoming difficult to detect, reducing your threat towards all enemies, reducing all damage taken by 50%, and increasing movement speed by 30%. Lasts <<1[%d/%d/%d]>> seconds. Dealing direct damage ends the effect prematurely.

Slashes the target for <<1>> weapon damage, slowing its movement speed by 50% for <<2[%d seconds/%d second/%d seconds]>> and reducing the healing it receives by 20% for <<3[%d seconds/%d second/%d seconds]>>. Requires two lightsabers.

Requires and converts 30 stacks of Fury to issue Predation to you and your Operation group members within 40 meters, increasing movement speed by 50% and melee and ranged defense by 10%. Lasts <<1[%d/%d/%d]>> seconds.
Strikes the target multiple times with both lightsabers, dealing <<1>> weapon damage and building 6 rage. Requires two lightsabers.
Requires and converts 30 stacks of Fury to issue Bloodthirst to you and your Operation group members within 40 meters, increasing all damage and healing done by 10% for <<1>> seconds.
Enters a furious frenzy, immediately building 30 stacks of Fury.
Reduces the damage you take by 99% for <<1[%d/%d/%d]>> seconds. When the effect ends, 50% of your current health is lost.
Increases the amount of Fury built by 2 when activating abilities that consume rage, and reduces the cooldown of Frenzy by 30 seconds.

Enters an acrobatic lightsaber form, increasing accuracy by 3%. In addition, your successful melee attacks have a 20% chance to trigger a second strike that deals <<1>> weapon damage. This effect cannot occur more than once every 1.5 seconds.
When your Ataru Form deals damage, your damage reduction and melee and ranged defense are increased by 2%. Stacks up to 3 times. Lasts <<1>> seconds.

Strikes the target with both weapons for <<1>> weapon damage and automatically triggers an Ataru Form strike, bypassing Ataru Form's rate limit. For 6 seconds after using Massacre, your Ataru Form has an extra 30% chance to be triggered. Requires two lightsabers.

Damage dealt by Ataru Form grants Execute, which makes your next Force Scream or Devastating Blast deal 5% more damage and sunder the target for <<1>> seconds. Sundered targets have their armor rating reduced by 20%.
Gores the target for <<1>> weapon damage and grants Gore for <<2[%d/%d/%d]>> seconds, which increases armor penetration by 100%. Requires two lightsabers.

Damage dealt by Ataru Form triggers Slaughter, which finishes the cooldown on Vicious Throw and makes your next Vicious Throw usable on a target at any health level without consuming any rage. This effect cannot occur more than once every 20 seconds.
Increases damage reduction by 2%. In addition, Dual Saber Throw builds 2 rage.
Unleashes a powerful blast of Force energy at the target, dealing <<1>> energy damage. The blast stuns standard and weak enemies for <<2>> seconds. Shares a cooldown with Force Scream.
While Ataru Form is active, Sweeping Slash triggers an Ataru Form strike on each enemy target it damages.
Reduces the cooldowns of Force Scream and Devastating Blast by 3 seconds and the rage they consume by 1.
Increases the damage dealt by your triggered Ataru Form attacks by 5%.
While Ataru Form is active, Berserk reduces the rage consumed by Massacre and Sweeping Slash by 1.
When Execute is consumed by Force Scream or Devastating Blast, you build 1 rage.
Increases the damage dealt with offhand lightsaber attacks by 25%.
Execute now additionally increases the critical chance of Force Scream and Devastating Blast by 100%.
Reduces the cooldown of Battering Assault by 3 seconds.
Increases the critical strike damage bonus of Massacre, Gore, and Devastating Blast by 10%.

Force Charge finishes the cooldown on Disruption. In addition, Saber Reflect lasts 2 seconds longer, and while Soresu Form is active, generates a high amount of threat on all engaged enemies within 30 meters when activated.
Threatening Scream protects all allies within range, excluding yourself, granting Sonic Wall, which absorbs a moderate amount of damage. Lasts <<1>> seconds.
Whenever your movement is impaired, you gain a 5% damage bonus to your next ability that consumes rage. This effect can stack up to 5 times and lasts <<1>> seconds.
Taking non-periodic area of effect damage generates 1 rage. This effect cannot occur more than once per second.
When you exit combat, the active cooldowns of Force Charge, Enrage, and Saber Throw are reduced by 100%.
Chilling Scream increases the movement speed of all allies within 8 meters, excluding yourself, by 50% for <<1>> seconds.

For the Immortal discipline, Smash slows the targets it damages by 60% for <<1>> seconds. For the Vengeance and Rage disciplines, Smash and Vengeful Slam sunder the targets they damage for <<2>> seconds. Sundered targets have their armor rating decreased by 20%.
Getting attacked reduces the active cooldown of Force Charge by 1 second. This effect cannot occur more than once every 1.5 seconds.
Force Charge, Crushing Blow, Impale, Obliterate, and Intercede grant Oppressor, which makes your next Chilling Scream consume no rage and activate with a 0.5 second global cooldown.
You generate 4 rage when stunned, immobilized, put to sleep, or knocked around.
Reduces the cooldown of Force Push by 15 seconds, and Chilling Scream no longer consumes any rage.
Reduces the cooldown of Force Choke by 15 seconds.
Reduces the cooldown of Enraged Defense by 30 seconds.
Endure Pain increases your movement speed by 50% and grants immunity to movement-impairing effects while active.
Sweeping Slash deals 25% more damage.
Reduces the cooldown of Intercede by 5 seconds and reduces the threat and damage taken by an additional 10% each for the friendly target of Intercede.
Reduces the cooldown of Unleash by 30 seconds and causes Unleash to heal you for 10% of your maximum health when used.
Saber Throw immobilizes the target for 3 seconds.
Ravage immobilizes the target for the duration of the ability.
Increases the duration of Force Charge's immobilize effect by 1 second.
Enraged Defense removes all cleansable effects when activated.
Increases all damage dealt by 5% for <<1>> seconds after dealing damage with Smash or Raging Burst. This effect cannot occur more than once every 8 seconds.

While Shii-Cho Form is active, Assault, Sundering Assault, Vicious Slash, Sweeping Slash, Retaliation, Force Scream, Vicious Throw, and Furious Strike reduce the active cooldowns of Smash, Raging Burst, and Obliterate by 1 second and Enrage by 2 seconds.
Reduces the cooldown of Obliterate by 3 seconds, and while Shii-Cho Form is active, Force Charge and Obliterate make your next Force Scream consume no rage.
Vicious Slash, Sweeping Slash, and Retaliation deal <<1>> additional Force energy damage.
Force Charge and Obliterate make your next Smash or Raging Burst used within <<1>> seconds an automatic critical hit.
Strikes the target for <<1>> weapon damage. Attacks with both weapons if dual wielding.

Progressively slows the target from 50% to 5% movement speed over <<1[%d seconds/%d second/%d seconds]>> and deals <<3>> kinetic damage each second. At the end of the duration, the target is crushed and takes an additional <<2>> kinetic damage.
Blasts the enemy target with a powerful burst of Force energy, dealing <<1>> kinetic damage.
Jumps to a target, dealing <<1>> weapon damage and immobilizing it for <<2>> second. Can be used while immobilized. Strikes with both weapons if dual wielding.

While Shii-Cho Form is active, damage dealt by Force Crush grants Shockwave, increasing the damage dealt by your next Smash or Raging Burst by 5% and reducing the rage consumed by your next Smash or Raging Burst by 34%. Shockwave stacks up to 3 times. Additionally, the cooldown of Enrage is reduced by 15 seconds, and Enrage instantly grants 3 stacks of Shockwave and generates 6 additional rage over <<1>> seconds when used while Shii-Cho Form is active.
Increases the critical strike chance of Vicious Throw and Furious Strike by 5%.
Obliterate and Force Crush each consume 1 less rage.
While Shii-Cho Form is active, Furious Strike enables Retaliation and beats down its target for 45 seconds. Beat Down targets take 5% more damage from melee attacks.
Increases the critical strike damage of all attacks by 15%.
Shii-Cho Form increases armor penetration by 30%.
Increases the damage dealt by Smash by 40% and reduces the cooldowns of Smash and Raging Burst by 3 seconds each.
Increases the damage you deal with saber attacks by 5%.
Retaliation raises a Blade Barricade, increasing your defense chance by 5% for <<1[%d seconds/%d second/%d seconds]>>.
Bashes the target for <<1>> kinetic damage, stunning it for <<2[%d seconds/%d second/%d seconds]>>. This ability generates a high amount of threat.

While in Soresu Form, parrying, deflecting, shielding, or resisting an attack has a 50% chance to grant Revenge, reducing the rage consumed by your next Force Scream or Vicious Throw by 1. Lasts up to <<1>> seconds, and stacks up to 3 times.
While in Soresu Form, activating Force Scream grants Sonic Barrier, which absorbs a moderate amount of damage. Lasts up to <<1>> seconds.

Crushes the target beneath a powerful blow, dealing <<1>> weapon damage, enabling your Retaliation, and impairing the target for <<2[%d seconds/%d second/%d seconds]>>. Impaired targets deal 5% less damage with Force and tech attacks. If you are protected by your Aegis Assault, Crushing Blow damages up to 7 additional nearby enemies for the same amount. Does not damage sleeping, lifted, or incapacitated enemies. This attack knocks down all affected standard and weak enemies. Generates a high amount of threat.
Targets damaged by your Smash and Sweeping Slash become unsteady. Unsteady targets have their melee and ranged accuracy decreased by 5% for <<1>> seconds.

Increases damage reduction by 3% for <<2[%d seconds/%d second/%d seconds]>>, generates 6 rage, and deals <<1>> weapon damage to the target with a series of quick melee attacks. Shares a cooldown with Sundering Assault.
Reduces all damage taken by 40% for <<1[%d seconds/%d second/%d seconds]>>.
Increases the duration of Endure Pain by 10 seconds. Increases elemental and internal damage reduction by 5%.
While Soresu Form is active, Retaliation consumes no rage and its critical chance is increased by 40%. In addition, the cooldown of Retaliation is reduced by 1 second while Saber Ward is active.
Smash deals 65% more damage and consumes 2 less rage. Additionally, the critical chance of Sweeping Slash is increased by 20%.
Increases the critical chance of Smash by 20%. Additionally, Aegis Assault increases shield absorption by 3%.
Force Choke no longer needs to be channeled, applying its full effect over 3 seconds.
Increases armor rating by 15%, and when your guarded target is attacked, your movement speed is increased by 30% for 6 seconds.

Reduces the rate limit by which Endless Rage can generate rage by 3 seconds, and reduces the rage consumed by Force Scream, Vicious Slash, Sweeping Slash, and Crushing Blow by 1. And while in Soresu Form, Vicious Slash and Sweeping Slash inflict their targets with Trauma, which reduces the healing received from all sources by 20% for 6 seconds.
Reduces the cooldown of Invincible by 30 seconds, increases the damage dealt by Backhand and Crushing Blow by 40%, and reduces the cooldown of Retaliation by 1 second.
Increases shield chance by 4% and reduces the cooldown of Saber Ward by 30 seconds.

Slams your weapon on the ground, causing a Force-empowered shockwave that deals <<1>> energy damage to up to 8 enemies within 5 meters. Stuns weak and standard enemies for <<2[%d seconds/%d second/%d seconds]>>. Shares a cooldown with Smash.
Enters an aggressive lightsaber form, increasing all damage dealt by 6% and movement speed by 15%. All attacks that consume rage will refund 1 rage when used.
Reduces the cooldown of Saber Throw by 5 seconds, and causes Saber Throw to sunder its target for <<1>> seconds. Sundered targets have their armor rating reduced by 20%.
Force Scream causes the target to bleed for <<1>> internal damage over <<2>> seconds.
Shatter, Impale, and Vicious Throw increase the critical chance of your next Force Scream by 50%. Lasts <<1>> seconds. Stacks up to 2 times.

Increases the damage dealt by your bleeding effects by 10%. In addition, your Ravage and bleed damage has a 30% chance to trigger Destroyer, which finishes the cooldown on Vicious Throw and makes your next Vicious Throw consume no rage and usable on a target with any health level. This effect cannot occur more than once every 20 seconds.
Impale causes the target to bleed for <<1>> internal damage over <<2>> seconds and beats the target down for <<3>> seconds. Beat Down targets take 5% more damage from melee attacks.
Impales the target for <<1>> weapon damage.
Channels the Force into your lightsaber and crushes your target under its weight, instantly dealing <<1>> internal damage, with a further <<2[%d/%d/%d]>> internal damage over <<3[%d/%d/%d]>> seconds.
Shatter finishes the active cooldown on Ravage and generates 3 rage.
While in Shien Form, Force Charge grants Unstoppable, increasing damage reduction by 20% and granting immunity to interrupts and all controlling effects for <<1>> seconds.

Smash and Vengeful Slam spread your bleed effects to all targets they damage, if at least one of the targets is already affected by your bleeds. In addition, Sweeping Slash deals 25% more damage to bleeding targets.
Reduces the cooldowns of Smash and Vengeful Slam by 6 seconds each, and both abilities no longer consume rage.
Reduces the cooldown of Impale by 6 seconds and Force Scream by 3 seconds.
Increases the critical chance of Shatter, Vengeful Slam, and bleeding effects by 10%.
Increases damage reduction by 5% at all times and by an additional 15% while Endure Pain is active. In addition, the cooldown of Intimidating Roar is reduced by 15 seconds.
Ravage deals 10% more damage.

Enters a defensive lightsaber form, increasing armor rating by 60%, damage reduction by 6%, shield chance by 15%, threat generation by 100%, and accuracy by 10%. While active, all damage dealt is reduced by 10%, and all Assault abilities generate 1 less rage.

While active, the guarded player takes 5% less damage and generates 25% less threat. In addition, so long as you remain within 15 meters of the guarded player, 50% of all incoming damage from enemy players is transferred back to you. Requires Soresu Form.
Able to equip heavy combat armor.

Reflects all direct single target ranged, Force, and tech attacks back to the attacker for <<1>> seconds. The damage done by each reflect is capped, and the cap rises with each new rank of the ability.
Generates 1 rage when attacked. This effect cannot occur more than once every 6 seconds.

Retaliates against the target for <<1>> weapon damage. Cannot be parried, dodged, or miss. While in Soresu Form, Retaliation can only be used after successfully defending against a melee or ranged attack. While not in Soresu Form, Retaliation can only be used after one of your melee attacks is parried, dodged, or misses.
Reduces the cooldowns of Sundering Assault and Aegis Assault by 3 seconds each and increases the rage they generate by 2.
Able to equip a personal shield generator in your off-hand.
The first 2 seconds of Saber Ward grants 100% melee and ranged defense.
Chills up to 8 enemies within 8 meters, dealing <<1>> elemental damage and reducing movement speed by 50% for <<2[%d seconds/%d second/%d seconds]>>.
Temporarily increases your maximum health by 30% for <<1[%d seconds/%d second/%d seconds]>>. When the effect ends, the health is lost.

This invisible passive ability sets a tag for 8 seconds after the Warrior parries/deflects/dodges or is missed by an attack while in Soresu Form, or has an attack miss, get parried/dodged while not in Soresu Form.
Deals <<1>> kinetic damage, knocks the target back several meters, and knocks the target down for <<2[%d/%d/%d]>> seconds. Force Push immediately finishes the cooldown of Force Charge.

Taunts all enemies within 15 meters, forcing them to attack you for <<1[%d seconds/%d second/%d seconds]>>, if in Soresu Form. If not in Soresu Form, threat will be immediately reduced by a moderate amount. Also, causes affected player targets to deal 30% less damage for <<2>> seconds when attacking anyone other than you.

Empowers you with 10 charges of Enraged Defense, lasting up to <<2>> seconds. Whenever you take damage a charge of Enraged Defense is consumed to heal you for <<1>>. This ability can be used while stunned or otherwise controlled but cannot be used while above 70% health.
Leaps to a friendly target, reducing his or her threat by a moderate amount and reducing damage taken by 20% for <<1[%d/%d/%d]>> seconds.

Generate 5 rage and strike the target for <<1>> weapon damage, sundering the target if your discipline is Vengeance or Rage. Sundered targets have their armor reduced by 20% for <<2[%d seconds/%d second/%d seconds]>>.
Able to equip a Force focus in your off-hand.
Immediately generates 6 rage.
Throws the main hand lightsaber at a distant target, inflicting <<1>> weapon damage and building 3 rage.
Taunts the target, forcing it to attack you for <<1[%d seconds/%d second/%d seconds]>>. Player targets deal 30% less damage when attacking anyone other than you for <<2>> seconds.

Increases the damage dealt by your weapon by 20% and grants a bonus based on your currently active form: Shii-Cho Form: Increases all Force damage dealt by 3%. Shien Form: Increases all melee damage dealt by 3%. Soresu Form: Increases melee and ranged defense by 3% and increases the threat generated by Smash and Sweeping Slash by 30%.
